flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=27>>27 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 27 bags = <<48-27=22>>22 bags for $22 each
22 bags were sold for 22 bags x $22/bag = $<<22*22=484>>484
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $484 = $<<306+250+484=1040>>1040
The salesman made $1040 - $576 = $<<1040-576=464>>464 in profit.
#### 464

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 22. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
